Reviews.Title: “good location”
Reviews.Author: Ian S
Reviews.Content: helpful friendly staff metres metro walking distance centre main attractions 2 standard double suite children’s spacious lots light 2nd floor 201 facing road suite 3rd floor spacious modern clean lines functional shower excellent drawback 302 facing inside walls natural light couldn’t weather till stepped outside hotel short stay breakfast adequate standard continental breakfast coffee recommend value money

Reviews.Title: “First class hotel for the budget traveller”
Reviews.Author: brightestspark
Reviews.Content: miguel team friendly helpful speak english hotel clean unique modern decor stayed suite spacious largest weve stayed europe bargain price free wifi strong signal 5th floor accessed lift location perfect easy access madrid airport metro station 3 mins walk hotel 15 minutes walk plaza mayor madrid attractions breakfast fresh fruit toast con tomato plain cereals coffee liking highly recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic and great value hotel”
Reviews.Author: tangybird
Reviews.Content: wouldnt hesitate recommend hotel quality staff amazing value money location close metro stops trains stations art museums visited august hot airconditioning recover heat quiet staff helpful recommending booking restaurants hotel towards cafes bars feel local touristy streets centre
